New Records: Virat Kohli hit his 49th ODI century, equalling Sachin Tendulkar's record
India scored 326-5, their highest score in the tournament
Key Match Events: Ravindra Jadeja took 5 wickets for 33 runs
Shubman Gill was dismissed for 23 runs in the 11th over
Shreyas Iyer was dismissed for 77 runs
Kuldeep Yadav and Mohammed Shami contributed with wickets
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli expressed pride in the team's performance
The win provided a morale boost ahead of the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was part of the Cricket World Cup 2023
India maintained a strong position in the tournament
